pButton.Name: Description
pButton.popInfo: If your purpose is to describe something in your essay, your introduction might include vivid imagery with interesting details or ideas to engage the reader to the subject.

pButton.Name: Define / Explain
pButton.popInfo: If your essay’s purpose is to define or explain what a concept is, you might want to define key terms in your introduction.

pButton.Name: Analyze
pButton.popInfo: If you are going to analyze a topic in your essay, you may want to place the subject in context in the introduction. Recall that this means identifying the time and place, historically and geographically.

pButton.Name: Cause and Effect
pButton.popInfo: If your purpose is to write a cause and effect essay, you could begin the introduction with essential background information.

pButton.Name: Argumentation
pButton.popInfo: If you are going to take a position and write an argumentation or persuasive essay, your introduction might identify the controversial issue.

pButton.Name: Narration
pButton.popInfo: If you are writing a narration and telling a story, you may want to describe the location, characters, or initial problem in the introduction.
